    • Method Detail

      • distributeRemainderWithoutTargets

        public static void distributeRemainderWithoutTargets(MonetaryAmount remainder,
                                     MonetaryAmount[] distribution,
                                     StringParameterKey remainderTreatment)
        Distribute remainder according to the specified remainder treatment.
        Parameters:
        remainder - the remainder to distribute
        distribution - the distribution over which the remainder will be distributed
        remainderTreatment - system configured remainder treatment - one of the remainder treatments in BCConfigParameters
        See Also:
        BCConfigParameters
